attributes.action: Change the terms of employment for the banks where taxpayers money has been used.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Large bonus payments regardless of performance should be written out of all contracts for these banks. Managers should be held more accountable rather than the fur lined cocoon that they enjoy at the moment. 
Government enquiries will do nothing to change the contracts of the more independent banks and will by thier cost be yet another drain on the public purse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
